blogPost.excerpt: You know how gradients are trendy, but adding a slight noise filter or grain to them is even trendier? Well now you don't have to crack open photoshop to get that effect with your own colors. Just go to noiseandgradient.com!
blogPost.body: You know how gradients are trendy, but adding a slight noise filter or grain to them is even trendier? Well now you don't have to crack open photoshop to get that effect with your own colors. Just go to noiseandgradient.com!
blogPost.title: Noise and Gradient - Generate trendy textures of your own, for free
blogPost.author: clara 🕶

localize.description: 你知道渐变是多么时髦，但给它们添加轻微的噪点滤镜或颗粒更时髦？好了，现在你不用打开photoshop就能用自己的颜色得到这种效果。只要去 noiseandgradient.com!
localize.tagline: 免费生成您自己的时尚纹理。

localize.description: 你知道漸變是多麼時髦，但給它們添加輕微的噪點濾鏡或顆粒更時髦？好了，現在你不用打開photoshop就能用自己的顏色得到這種效果。只要去 noiseandgradient.com!
localize.tagline: 免費生成您自己的時尚紋理。

previous.excerpt: VS Code Theme Studio enables you to quickly and easily design your own VS Code theme in an intuitive, user-friendly, web-based interface. No more messing around with nasty JSON files, editing raw hex color codes, and tweaking settings.
previous.title: VS Code Theme Studio - Create your own VS Code theme easily, within your browser

localize.description: VS Code Theme Studio可以让你在一个直观的、用户友好的、基于网络的界面中快速、轻松地设计自己的VS Code主题。无需再使用讨厌的JSON文件，编辑原始的十六进制颜色代码，以及调整设置。
localize.tagline: 在浏览器中轻松创建自己的VS Code主题。

localize.description: VS Code Theme Studio可以讓你在一個直觀的、用戶友好的、基於網絡的界面中快速、輕鬆地設計自己的VS Code主題。無需再使用討厭的JSON文件，編輯原始的十六進制顏色代碼，以及調整設置。
localize.tagline: 在瀏覽器中輕鬆創建自己的VS Code主題。

next.excerpt: Developers have been using the Grouparoo UI to set up automated data movement from their databases to cloud-based tools like Mailchimp. Grouparoo now supports declarative code to set up this pipeline so you manage data sync just like you would any other app.
next.title: Grouparoo 2.0 - Integrate with marketing tools using low-code configuration

localize.description: 开发人员一直在使用Grouparoo用户界面来设置从他们的数据库到Mailchimp等云端工具的自动数据移动。Grouparoo现在支持声明式代码来设置这个管道，所以你可以像管理其他应用一样管理数据同步。
localize.tagline: 使用低代码配置与营销工具集成

localize.description: 開發人員一直在使用Grouparoo用戶界面來設置從他們的數據庫到Mailchimp等雲端工具的自動數據移動。Grouparoo現在支持聲明式代碼來設置這個管道，所以你可以像管理其他應用一樣管理數據同步。
localize.tagline: 使用低代碼配置與營銷工具集成
